thread.title: UN and French peacekeepers face child rape allegations - BBC News
thread.title_full: UN and French peacekeepers face child rape allegations - BBC News

title: UN and French peacekeepers face child rape allegations - BBC News
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device UN and French peacekeepers face child rape allegations 24 February 2017 Last updated at 00:08 GMT 
There have been over a hundred allegations of sexual abuse and exploitation by United Nations and French peacekeepers in the Central African Republic. 
The BBC's Fergal Keane investigates. 
Producer Alice Doyard, cameraman Tony Fallshaw, editor James Reevell Related Topics
